sourcesContent:
Enter Customer name


Address


Phone Number


Additional Message

Customer Name: {{ customerName}}
{{ address}}
{{ phoneNumber }}
{{ addionalMessage }}
Date: {{currentDate | date:'yyyy-MM-dd'}}

Service Brand Number of Items Price Total
{{ item.size }} {{item.brandName}} {{ item.number_of_items }} {{ item.price }} ${{ item.number_of_items * item.price }}
Total: {{ getSubtotal() | currency:'CAD':'symbol':'1.2-2' }}
TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. No returns/exchange, if mounted.
2. 1 year manufacture warranty, road hazard is not included.
4. Physical or any damage on sidewall will not be covered.
5. Please check your lock key after getting your car back from service.
